title: Pls help
body:
So I was in a rank game and suddenly i coudnt connect to the game.  When I closed the game and opened it it said I have to re install the game.
Can I get my lost LP back?

replies.body:
It looks like a game file was corrupted somehow, which is why the patcher wants you to reinstall the game. While we can't make any changes to your LP, we _can _ take some steps to be sure this doesn't happen again. 

Let's go ahead and run the [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) with the options Force Repatch and Reinstall checked. This way, we'll be sure you have a fresh install of the game.
